links.title: This Solar-Powered "Tesla" iPhone X Costs Over $4,500
links.description: Russian phone accessory company Caviar has released a solar-powered iPhone X case (which comes with an iPhone X) selling for over $4,500. Dubbed "the iPhone X Tesla," the phone case, which is IP67 water and dust resistant, features a solar panel on the back, alongside an extra battery.
